title: Implement Validation Gates Script
description: Create scripts/validation-gates.py with executable validation checks for pre-execution and post-execution gates. Implement blocking failures, warnings, and info levels. Must handle task breakdown validation (difficulty >=7 must be broken down) and auto-complete parent tasks when all subtasks finish.
completion_notes: Implemented comprehensive validation-gates.py with pre-execution and post-execution checks. Includes blocking/warning/info levels, breakdown validation for difficulty >=7 tasks, parent auto-completion checks, confidence thresholds, assumption validation, and pattern suggestions. CLI interface for testing with JSON output option.
notes: Pre-execution checks: status_valid, dependencies_complete, difficulty_breakdown, files_exist. Post-execution checks: parent_auto_complete, files_modified, suggest_patterns. Output structured JSON matching gate schema.
assumptions: Gate results follow existing schema from validation-gates.md
Integration with task-manager.py for file operations
decision_rationale: Validation gates are critical for preventing errors and ensuring task system integrity. Must enforce breakdown rules for high-difficulty tasks.
